CutSceneText.Text: During the great sickness, hundreds of people came to Adma Stronghold, seeking refuge.
What pesky wretches. Close the gate before they spread the disease!
Help us! Let us in! Please! You have to help us! Let us in!
But only the noble were allowed shelter--the common people sickened and died outside the gate...
and became the undead that wander those grounds even now.
